text: William Muir Kelly (14 August 1922 – 11 July 1996) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a centre half for Dunfermline Athletic, Airdrieonians, Blackburn Rovers, Mossley, Accrington Stanley and Darwen.http://www.neilbrown.newcastlefans.com/player3/williekelly.html His brother Walter Kelly was also a footballer. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:1996 deaths Category:Scottish footballers Category:Dunfermline Athletic F.C. players Category:Airdrieonians F.C. title: Willie Kelly (footballer)
